# keyboardMetrics

**Type Property**

A sensor that provides information about keyboard usage.

## Declaration

```swift
static let keyboardMetrics: SRSensor
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/SRFetchResult/sample] type for this sensor is [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/SRKeyboardMetrics].

You need to provide a reason to record keyboard metrics by adding the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/NSSensorKitUsageDetail/SRSensorUsageKeyboardMetrics] dictionary to the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/NSSensorKitUsageDetail] key in the information property list.

## Reading device sensors

- **deviceUsageReport**: A sensor that provides information about device usage.
- **onWristState**: A sensor that describes the watch’s position on the wrist.
